#summary Roadmap for upcoming releases of Job Manager

= 0.5 =

== Abstract ==

Allow user registration, application tracking and feedback

== Due ==

Late January 2010

== New Features ==

  * Allow users to register: Issue #8 (multi-part issue, will not be closed before release)
  * Keep an archive of all communication: Issue #2
  * Rank applicants for easy filtering: Issue #45
  * Forward Applicants to other users: Issue #54
  * Email applications per-job: Issue #69
  * Add an 'Add Job' button to the wp-admin menu: Issue #72 (multi-part issue, will not be closed before release)

----

  * Sticky Jobs: Issue #46
  * Job List sort order: Issue #49
  * Editable `<title>` prefix: Issue #51

  * Customise the Thankyou For Applying text: Issue #57
  * Make the Job Editing page more like WP's Post/Page editing: Issue #62, Issue #63
  * Customize the application method: Issue #66
  * Make the admin Jobs List prettier: Issue #67
  * Feature Job Widget: Issue #70
  * Option to include categories under main job page in page list: Issue #73
